meanings.definition: A virus that can cause warts or certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the papillomavirus could lead to warts on the skin.
meanings.sent2: She learned in biology class that papillomavirus is a virus that can cause cancer.
meanings.sent3: The papillomavirus decided to throw a party on the skin, but no one showed up.
meanings.sent4: The papillomavirus spread through the body like wildfire, leaving warts in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The image of papillomavirus attacking healthy cells stuck in her mind.

meanings.definition: A type of virus that infects the skin and mucous membranes.
meanings.sent1: The papillomavirus infection on his skin caused discomfort.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are researching ways to prevent the spread of papillomavirus in the body.
meanings.sent3: The papillomavirus on the skin seemed to be having a dance party.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were invaded by the papillomavirus, spreading like a shadow over her skin.
meanings.sent5: The papillomavirus lurked in the shadows, waiting to infect the next victim.
